Dear Graydon?
Enclosed is a proposal from John Holt for an NAEB Network
Committee. Such a committee, as outlined here# should make for a
much smoother and effective Network operation.
I think the proposal and the notes which follow it give
the picture. The proposal could easily be adapted as an announceÂ¬
ment if it were decided to activate this committee.
We*d be grateful for your reaction.
